columns.text:
The elegant buildings stretch round the refreshing central swimming pool, promoting a private environment where the guests can mingle and get to know one another in the most wonderful atmosphere while on vacations. Socialising is part of the decor and those who are interested in meeting new and fascinating people are going to love Art Hotel.

With a decoration of mixed colors and stylish, ten modern deluxe suites will travel the guests beyond luxury and offers precious moments of endless relaxation.

items.title: Naughty Suite
items.description: Naughty Suite is singular in its taste and character, as its name reveals.
items.excerpt: Naughty Suite is singular in its taste and character, as its name reveals.
items.seo_title: Naughty Suite | Rooms | Art Hotel Santorini
items.seo_description: The Naughty Suite features an exquisite nest-like bedroom. Double rain shower with imposting armchair. 3 verandas with private jacuzzi. Book this suite today!
items.small_info: Up to 2 Guests/ sea / mountain view

items.title: Bohemian Suite
items.description: The perfect option for 4 guests with well sized verandas.
items.excerpt: The perfect option for 4 guests with well sized verandas.
items.seo_title: Bohemian Suite | Rooms | Art Hotel Santorini
items.seo_description: The Bohemian Suite features a 65 sq. interior hosting up to 4 guests. 2 verandas with fabulous sea views, one overlooks the pool. Book this suite now!
items.small_info: Up to 4 Guests/ Mountain or Pool view

items.title: Blissful Suite
items.description: Blissful Suite is a fabulous option for companies of friends, hosting up to four guests in its two bedrooms with king size beds.
items.excerpt: Blissful Suite is a fabulous option for companies of friends, hosting up to four guests in its two bedrooms with king size beds.
items.seo_title: Blissful Suite | Rooms | Art Hotel Santorini
items.seo_description: The Blissful Suite features a 65 sq.m interior hosting up to 4 guests. Bar space, veranda overlooking the pool. 3 TV sets, double rain shower. Book now!

items.title: Three60 Suite
items.description: Three60 Suite offers a panoramic view to the Aegean Sea and Pyrgos village, as its name suggests.
items.excerpt: Three60 Suite offers a panoramic view to the Aegean Sea and Pyrgos village, as its name suggests.
items.seo_title: Three60 Suite | Rooms | Art Hotel Santorini
items.seo_description: The Three60 Suite offers a panoramic view of the sea and village. An ample veranda overlooking the swimming pool, with table and chairs. Book this suite today!

items.title: Evangeline's Maisonette
items.description: The maisonette stretches to two different levels, with the bedroom perched on the open loft.
items.excerpt: The maisonette stretches to two different levels, with the bedroom perched on the open loft.
items.seo_title: Evangeline's Maisonette | Rooms | Art Hotel Santorini
items.seo_description: Evangeline's Maisonette has a 40 sq.m interior on 2 levels. The balcony overlooks the swimming pool. Bathroom with rain shower. Book this now!

items.title: Summer Mood Suite
items.description: Get into summer mood and relish all the deluxe facilities.
items.excerpt: Get into summer mood and relish all the deluxe facilities.
items.seo_title: Summer Mood Suite | Rooms | Art Hotel Santorini
items.seo_description: The Summer Mood Suite offers comfort & privacy. 60 sq.m interior. Balcony with sea view. Heated plunge pool with jets and sun loungers. Book this one now!
items.small_info: Up to 2 Guests/ Pool / Sea View

items.title: Smart & Bold Suite
items.description: Smart & Bold Suite highlights its modern, hip character.
items.excerpt: Smart & Bold Suite highlights its modern, hip character.
items.seo_title: Smart & Bold Suite | Rooms | Art Hotel Santorini
items.seo_description: The Smart & Bold Suite is modern & hip; double rain shower and glass ceiling. Large terrace overlooking the sea. Private plunge pool. Book this suite today!

items.title: Nest Suite
items.description: Nest Suite is ideal for those who are interested in outdoor living.
items.excerpt: Nest Suite is ideal for those who are interested in outdoor living.
items.seo_title: Nest Suite | Rooms | Art Hotel Santorini
items.seo_description: The Nest Suite is small & cozy with a huge terrace, large heated private plunge pool, table and chairs and splendid views of the sea and village. Book now!

items.title: Bird's Eye Suite
items.description: From Birds Eye Suite, the view is astonishing. It is located at the highest spot of Art Hotel on the second floor, boasting exceptional views to the Aegean Sea, part of the breathtaking caldera...
items.excerpt: From Birds Eye Suite, the view is astonishing. It is located at the highest spot of Art Hotel on the second floor, boasting exceptional views to the Aegean Sea, part of the breathtaking caldera...
items.seo_title: Bird's Eye Suite | Rooms | Art Hotel Santorini
items.seo_description: The Bird Eye's Suite is at highest spot of hotel - breathtaking views of sea & caldera. Huge private balcony with outdoor jacuzzi. Book this suite now!

items.title: Absolute Suite
items.description: Absolute Suite is simply the very best suite of Art Hotel.
items.excerpt: Absolute Suite is simply the very best suite of Art Hotel.
items.seo_title: Absolute Suite | Rooms | Art Hotel Santorini
items.seo_description: The Absolute Suite is on 2 levels. 60 sq.m elegant interior, large living room. Very large terrace with private plunge pool & heated jacuzzi. Book it today!

items.title: Free Room Upgrade 2
items.description: Book now your holiday and get a free room upgrade for a stay between 21st of April until 21st of May 2021

items.title: Free Room Upgrade 1
items.description: Book now your holiday and get a free room upgrade for a stay between 21st of April until 21st of May 2021

SEO.title: Rooms | Art Hotel Santorini | Aqua Vista Hotels
SEO.description: Check out the luxury rooms of Aqua Vista Hotel's Art Hotel, located in the quaint village of Pyrgos, Santorini.
